name: Thief (itch) (Jakub Poczatek, CaolanMaher)
description: You play as a up-and-coming thief trying to make it big by making his very heist a big one. Your job is to steal the treasured piece of art present in the art gallery.  You will have to be careful and stealthy as a wide range of guards will be patrolling the area ready to capture you if you stumble.
